testcase.name: English - Audio Bible Listening player works properly
testcase.summary: Users should be able to play, fast-forward, rewind and pause the audio without any issues while listening to the Bible

testcase.name: English - Able to navigate browse and chapers
testcase.summary: Users should be able to use Book and verse navigation and are able to choose any book and verse from the list

testcase.name: Able to listen to the Bible in Both English and Arabic
testcase.summary:
Users should be able to listen to the Bible in English and Arabic
The app should track the minutes
The audio player should work well in both English and Arabic

testcase.name: English - Launch Bible audio
testcase.summary: Tapping the red Bible icon in the upper-right will launch the audio player.

testcase.name: English - Audio progress bar can be dragged
testcase.summary: Dragging the audio progress bar to a different position should advance (or rewind) the audio to the chosen position

testcase.name: English - Audio progress bar can be tapped
testcase.summary: Tapping a position in the audio progress bar should advance the audio to the tapped position.

testcase.name: Arabic - Audio Bible Listening player works properly
testcase.summary: Users should be able to play, fast-forward, rewind and pause the audio without any issues while listening to the Bible

testcase.name: Arabic - Able to navigate browse and chapers
testcase.summary: Users should be able to use Book and verse navigation and are able to choose any book and verse from the list

testcase.name: Arabic - Launch Bible audio
testcase.summary: Tapping the red Bible icon in the upper-right will launch the audio player.

testcase.name: Arabic - Audio progress bar can be dragged
testcase.summary: Dragging the audio progress bar to a different position should advance (or rewind) the audio to the chosen position

testcase.name: Arabic - Audio progress bar can be tapped
testcase.summary: Tapping a position in the audio progress bar should advance the audio to the tapped position.

testcase.name: Find it - Users are able to play Find it game properly
testcase.summary: Users should be able to find hidden crosses

testcase.name: Find it - Next screen button indicator displays when finding all of the crosses
testcase.summary:
When users find all of the crosses on a page, there should be the next screen indicatior so that users can navigate to the next page
 cross count in current page
 display arrow pulsing at the right side of screen after finding all crosses
 display success messaging followed by completion screen after finding all crosses for a story

testcase.name: Find it - Blue chevron button
testcase.summary: While users play the Find it game, they can jump (skip) to other game page by tapping the blue chevron button which is at the right bottom of the page

testcase.name: Find it - Cross counter increments
testcase.summary: Users should be able to check the increments of the cross counter (which is in the upper-right area of the story screen) when they find the hidden crosses while playing the game

testcase.name: Puzzle - Users are able to play Puzzle game properly
testcase.summary: Users should be able to snap puzzle pieces on the illustrations from each story

testcase.name: Puzzle - Puzzle pieces move smoothly when a piece is closer to the correct spot
testcase.summary: Puzzle piece should move properly when dragging or snapping a piece to near the correct spot

testcase.name: Puzzle - Select easy, medium or hard puzzle level
testcase.summary: Users are able to select the puzzle levels like easy, medium, or hard by tapping the buttons

testcase.name: Puzzle - Display the result page when the puzzle game is completed
testcase.summary: Users are able to review the scores and points and are able to navigate to the Next game, repaly the game, and go back to the puzzles game page

testcase.name: Listeninig to the audio Bible while playing a game
testcase.summary: Users are able to play games while they are listening to the audio bible at the same time

testcase.name: Memory Verses - Users are able to play Memory Verse game properly
testcase.summary: Users should be able to play this game to help them memorize verses from each story

testcase.name: Memory Verses - Correct Title with correct memory verse
testcase.summary: The app should display the correct title for the corresponding memory verse from the verse list and the activity screens

testcase.name: Memory Verses - Size of Tiles should match with the correct spots
testcase.summary: The size of the tiles should match with the correct spots so that users can find the correct spot easily

testcase.name: Memory Verses - Verse Recording options
testcase.summary: There should be a Verse Recording button, Delete Recording button, and Playback button, and a Done button. After clicking the Done button, it should navigate to the end page which contains Verses, Replay and Next Verse buttons. At the bottom of the page, there are 3 icons for playing more games

testcase.name: Memory Verses - Cancel option in delete alerts
testcase.summary: There should be a Cancel option in the delete alerts

testcase.name: Color Pages - Coloring Tools have textures
testcase.summary: Verify that Pencil, Marker, and Brush tools have some textures

testcase.name: Color Pages - Color Pages options
testcase.summary:
Users should be able to use all of the color pages options:
 selecting different brush size
 selecting different colors

testcase.name: Color Pages - Share and Save options
testcase.summary:
sending the color pages to email

saving to camera roll

testcase.name: Memory Verses - Corresponding story image is background to Memory verses
testcase.summary: It should display the corresponding story image as background to Memory Verses

testcase.name: Armor of God - Able to collect all armor pieces from completing activities
testcase.summary: Users are able to collect points when they listen to the stories and playing activities

testcase.name: Archivements - The Achievements section from the Armory displays each activity results
testcase.summary:
The Achievements section contains:
Crosses Found, Stories Completed, Puzzles Solved, Verses Memorized, Thoughts Recorded, Minutes Listened

testcase.name: Recordings - Able to replay, delete, and send records in the Recordings section of the Armory
testcase.summary: Users are able to replay, delete, and send records in the Recordings section under the Armory menu without any issues

testcase.name: English - Display the Instructions when selecting one of stories
testcase.summary: When Users select one of the stories, The Instructions pops up with the continue button on it

testcase.name: English - Paused box play button
testcase.summary: Tap the "Pause" icon which is the bottom left of the story screen. The "Paused" box should pop up. Tap the "Play" button. The box should disappear and the app should start playing the story audio

testcase.name: English - Paused box restart button
testcase.summary: Tap the "Pause" icon which is the bottom left of the story screen. The "Paused" box should pop up. Tap the "Restart" button which is next to the "Play" button. The box should disappear and the app should restart playing the story audio from the beginning

testcase.name: English - Paused box home button
testcase.summary: Tapping the "Pause" icon which is the bottom left of the story screen. The "Pased" box should pops up. Tapping the "Home" button. The box is disappeared and it should navigate to the main page

testcase.name: English - Paused box stories button
testcase.summary: Tap the "Pause" icon which is the bottom left of the story screen. The "Paused" box should pop up. Tap the "Stories" button. The box should disappear and the app should navigate to the Stories page

testcase.name: English - Paused box help (?) button
testcase.summary: Tap the "Pause" icon which is the bottom left of the story screen. The "Paused" box should pop up. Tap the "?" button. The box should disappear and the app should display the Instructions box

testcase.name: English - Cross counter increments
testcase.summary: Users should be able to check the increments of the cross counter (which is in the upper-right area of the story screen) when they find the hidden crosses in the current story page while listening to the story

testcase.name: English - Points/coins accrued in Result page
testcase.summary: Users should be able to check or review the results of points, cross increments, and other scores when they finish listening to each story

testcase.name: English - Scenes change when progress bar crosses into new section
testcase.summary: Each story contains multiple scenes. Users are able to see the scene changes when the progress bar crosses into a new section

testcase.name: Arabic - Display the Instructions when selecting one of stories
testcase.summary: When Users select one of the stories, The Instructions pops up with the continue button on it

testcase.name: Arabic - Paused box play button
testcase.summary: Tap the "Pause" icon which is the bottom left of the story screen. The "Paused" box should pop up. Tap the "Play" button. The box should disappear and the app should start playing the story audio

testcase.name: Arabic - Paused box restart button
testcase.summary: Tap the "Pause" icon which is the bottom left of the story screen. The "Paused" box should pop up. Tap the "Restart" button which is next to the "Play" button. The box should disappear and the app should restart playing the story audio from the beginning

testcase.name: Arabic - Paused box home button
testcase.summary: Tapping the "Pause" icon which is the bottom left of the story screen. The "Pased" box should pops up. Tapping the "Home" button. The box is disappeared and it should navigate to the main page

testcase.name: Arabic - Paused box stories button
testcase.summary: Tap the "Pause" icon which is the bottom left of the story screen. The "Paused" box should pop up. Tap the "Stories" button. The box should disappear and the app should navigate to the Stories page

testcase.name: Arabic - Paused box help (?) button
testcase.summary: Tap the "Pause" icon which is the bottom left of the story screen. The "Paused" box should pop up. Tap the "?" button. The box should disappear and the app should display the Instructions box

testcase.name: Arabic - Cross counter increments
testcase.summary: Users should be able to check the increments of the cross counter (which is in the upper-right area of the story screen) when they find the hidden crosses in the current story page while listening to the story

testcase.name: Arabic - Points/coins accrued in Result page
testcase.summary: Users should be able to check or review the results of points, cross increments, and other scores when they finish listening to each story

testcase.name: Arabic - Scenes change when progress bar crosses into new section
testcase.summary: Each story contains multiple scenes. Users are able to see the scene changes when the progress bar crosses into a new section

testcase.name: Interruption - email, notifications, messages
testcase.summary: When users are getting an email or some notifications from other apps or text messages while using the app, it should not bother the app process /actions

testcase.name: Device Settings - Stable behavior with different regional settings
testcase.summary: When the device has a different regional setting selected, it should behave the same as it does in the US.

testcase.name: Device Settings - Stable behavior in different languages
testcase.summary: When the device has a different language setting selected, it should behave the same as it does in English

testcase.name: Device Settings - Stable behavior in airplane mode
testcase.summary: When the device is in airplane mode, it should behave the same as when airplane mode is off.

testcase.name: Parental Gate - Popup alert with math questions
testcase.summary: When users try to email Memory verse recordings, What the story meant to me recordings, and Coloring pages, the alert popup should display and ask math questions (addition / subtraction of 2 digit numbers)?

testcase.name: Parental Gate - Process of Sending a file to email using valid email address
testcase.summary: The alerts pops up when tapping email button to ask a simple math question. Users should put the answer and hit the continue button to send it to a valid email address. Users should be able to send the file by email.

testcase.name: Parental Gate - Process of Sending a file to email using invalid email address
testcase.summary: The alerts pops up when tapping email button to ask a simple math question. Users should put the answer and hit the continue button and send it to an invalid email address. Invalid Adress alerts should pop up telling the user to correct the e-mail address.

testcase.name: English - For Parents icon navigates to the details page
testcase.summary: Tapping on the For Parents icon / section from the main page. It should navigate to the details page

testcase.name: English - URLs navigate correctly when clicked in "About this App"
testcase.summary: When you click on either of the two URLs in the "About this App" section, they should correctly launch the browser and go to a live website.

testcase.name: English - For Parents, Privacy policy content available
testcase.summary: Privacy policy text is viewable when the "Privacy Policy" tab is clicked.

testcase.name: English - For Parents, Terms of use content available
testcase.summary: Terms of use text is viewable when the "Terms of Use" tab is tapped.

testcase.name: Change language setting
testcase.summary: Tapping the red button which is under the "For Parents" icon / section. Users should be able to change language setting in either English or Arabic

testcase.name: The App is loading properly when tapping the app icon
testcase.summary: Tapping the Kidz Bible app to start it on the device. It should load properly with a reasonable loading time

testcase.name: All of the app menus are displayed properly after launching it
testcase.summary: All of the app's top-level menus like "Stories", "Games", and "Armory" should display on the launch page. Make sure the "FCBH logo" (A Ministry of faith Comes By Hearing) is present.

testcase.name: Display the Armor of God Introduction for the first time users
testcase.summary:
The Armor of God Introduction should be displayed when starting the app for the first time
Avatar should change from tunic to armor
User proceeds to Armor Avatar selection screen
Once avatar has been selected, user is taken to the home screen

testcase.name: When switching to either landscape or portrait mode, the app should be stable condition
testcase.summary: When users switch to either landscape or portrait mode of devices, the app should be stable condition and users should be able to keep using the app without any issues or the app crashes
